purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the identification of a class in a library compliant to ISO 13584 (Parts Library).
This edition incorporates modifications to the previous edition listed below.
The following MIM EXPRESS declarations have been changed:

inscope.li: The identification of a class in a library compliant to ISO 13584 (Parts Library).

outscope.li: The identification of classes in external libraries that are not compliant to ISO 13584 (Parts Library).

uof.name: Plib_Class_Reference
uof.description: The Plib_Class_Reference UoF specifies the data structure needed to identify a class in a library compliant to ISO 13584 (Parts Library).

ae.refpath: externally_defined_class <= [class <= group] [externally_defined_item {externally_defined_item.source -> external_source => known_source <= pre_defined_item pre_defined_item.name = 'ISO 13584 library'}]

aa.refpath: externally_defined_class <= externally_defined_item {externally_defined_item externally_defined_item.source -> external_source => known_source <= pre_defined_item pre_defined_item.name = 'ISO 13584 library'} externally_defined_item.item_id

externally_defined_class {externally_defined_class <= externally_defined_item externally_defined_item.source -> external_source => known_source <= pre_defined_item pre_defined_item.name = 'ISO 13584 library'} externally_defined_class <= class organization_item = class organization_item <- applied_organization_assignment.items[i] applied_organization_assignment <= organization_assignment {organization_assignment.role -> organization_role organization_role.name = 'class supplier'} organization_assignment.assigned_organization -> organization organization.id
